title: Literacy for a lifetime
creator_credit: Film Australia, Ben Cardillo and Paul Hawker
brief_description: In today’s society, the ability to communicate effectively is vital, and people communicate with each other in many ways. Joan Rothery shows how to apply the principles of written communication and their effect on written literacy in the primary school. Teacher’s notes prepared by Jim Martin and Joan Rothery.
